remarks: Value of vector subtraction in terms of addition.  ( ~ hvsubval analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodvsubval2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmodvsubval2.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodvsubval2.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lmodvsubval2.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodvsubval2.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lmodvsubval2.n $e |- N = ( invg ` F ) $.
lmodvsubval2.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) $.
lmodvsubval2 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A .- B ) = ( A .+ ( ( N ` .1. ) .x. B ) ) ) $.
